mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELL_INFO ( SELL_SEQ_NO, TITLE, SELL_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, USER_ID )VALUES ( SELL_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{sellContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT SI.SELL_SEQ_NO as sellSeqNo, SI.TITLE as title, SI.SELL_CONTENTS as sellContents, SI.REG_DT as regDt, SI.CHG_DT as chgDt, SI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM SELL_INFO SI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID

SELECT SI.SELL_SEQ_NO as sellSeqNo, SI.TITLE as title, SI.SELL_CONTENTS as sellContents, SI.REG_DT as regDt, SI.CHG_DT as chgDt, SI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM SELL_INFO SI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE SI.SELL_SEQ_NO = #{sellSeqNo}
